name: Stewed Beans
keywords: dairy-free, gluten-free, fall, winter, main course, side dish

recipeInstructions.text:
Put dried beans, rosemary sprigs and a chunk of
slab bacon in a pot with water to cover by an inch or so.
Bring pot to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until
the beans are done. Garnish: More rosemary sprigs.
